data.actual_result: There is an awkward gap between the top and bottom areas of the Quick Selector
data.expected_result: There should be no gap between the top and bottom areas of the Quick Selector
data.short_description: The Quick Selector on Note phones (possibly any phone with a 18.5:9 aspect ratio) has awkward gaps at the top and bottom of the screen when your keyboard is closed
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the Quick Selector - Close your keyboard - Observe
